page.title: 18Firritin (dialect)
page.content: Ah gan{FIRRITIN}tae catch rabbits. Ah've goat 15 polecats. When ah gan up the hull an set them doon the hole, ah listen fur a strange bumpin noise in the birries. The rabbits ur chased oot o the birries intae the nets, then ah kill them deed. When firrits line wi each ither, the dug firrit grabs the bitch bi the neck an mates.The firrits ur funny an they lick yer face wan minute an bite yer face anither. {TRANSLATION:} I go ferreting to catch rabbits. I own 15 polecats. When I go up the hill and set them down the hole, I listen for a strange bumping noise in the burrows. Rabbits are chased from the burrows into the nets, then I kill them. When ferrets mate,the male grabs the female by the neck. Ferrets are funny. They lick your face one minute and bite you the next. George Blackwood (10)
